<style>
    .header-container {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        width: 100%;
        padding: 15px 30px;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1000;
    }

    .header-content {
        max-width: 1400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .logo-container {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
    }

    .logo-image {
        height: 60px;
        width: auto;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    }

    .logo-image:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }

    .nav-container {
        flex: 1;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }

    .nav-list {
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        gap: 40px;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .nav-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        padding: 8px 0;
        position: relative;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .nav-link:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        width: 0;
        height: 2px;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        background-color: #00FF00;
        transition: width 0.3s ease;
    }

    .nav-link:hover:after {
        width: 100%;
    }

    /* Dropdown Styles */
    .dropdown {
        position: relative;
    }

    .dropdown-content {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        min-width: 220px;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.15);
        border-radius: 4px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);
        top: 100%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        padding: 8px 0;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1002;
    }

    .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
        display: block;
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .dropdown-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        display: block;
        font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: 500;
        text-align: left;
        white-space: nowrap;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
    }

    .dropdown-link:hover {
        background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        padding-left: 25px;
    }

    .submenu {
        left: 100%;
        top: -8px;
        transform: none;
    }

    .dropdown:hover > .dropdown-content.submenu {
        display: block;
    }

    /* Mobile Menu Toggle */
    .menu-toggle {
        display: none;
        background: none;
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        padding: 5px;
        margin-left: 10px;
        z-index: 1003;
    }

    .menu-toggle span {
        display: block;
        width: 25px;
        height: 3px;
        margin: 5px 0;
        background: #00FF00;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* Responsive Styles */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .nav-list {
            gap: 30px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 10px 20px;
        }
        .menu-toggle {
            display: block;
        }
        .nav-container {
            position: fixed; /* Changed from absolute to fixed */
            top: 80px;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: max-height 0.5s ease;
            z-index: 1001;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }
        .nav-container.active {
            max-height: 85vh; /* Limit height to prevent overflow issues */
            overflow-y: auto;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        .nav-list {
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 20px;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 16px;
            width: 100%;
            display: block;
            padding: 10px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Remove underline animation for mobile */
        .nav-link:after {
            display: none;
        }
        /* Add explicit plus indicator for dropdowns */
        .dropdown > .nav-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown.active > .nav-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        .dropdown-content {
            position: static;
            width: 100%;
            transform: none;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            opacity: 1;
            display: block;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 15px;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-content {
            max-height: 1000px;
            padding: 8px 0;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Style submenu dropdowns in mobile */
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link {
            padding-right: 30px; /* Space for plus indicator */
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown.active > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        /* Fix submenu position */
        .submenu {
            position: static;
            margin-left: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 8px 15px; /* Reduce padding for smaller screens */
        }
        .header-content {
            flex-direction: row;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .logo-image {
            height: 45px;
        }
        .nav-container {
            top: 62px; /* Adjust based on header height */
        }
        /* Better spacing for dropdown items */
        .dropdown-content {
            margin-left: 10px;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 12px 10px;
        }
    }

    /* Add margin to page content to prevent header overlap */
    body {
        padding-top: 90px;
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        body {
            padding-top: 62px; /* Match the header height */
        }
    }
</style>

<!-- JavaScript for Mobile Menu -->
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
        const navContainer = document.querySelector('.nav-container');
        const dropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown');
        
        // Toggle mobile menu
        menuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
            navContainer.classList.toggle('active');
            // Prevent body scrolling when menu is open
            document.body.style.overflow = navContainer.classList.contains('active') ? 'hidden' : '';
        });
        
        // Handle dropdowns on mobile
        dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
            const link = dropdown.querySelector('.nav-link, .dropdown-link');
            link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                    if (dropdown.classList.contains('dropdown') && 
                        dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-content')) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent event bubbling
                        
                        // Close other same-level dropdowns
                        const parentUl = dropdown.parentNode;
                        const siblings = parentUl.querySelectorAll(':scope > .dropdown');
                        siblings.forEach(sibling => {
                            if (sibling !== dropdown) {
                                sibling.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        dropdown.classList.toggle('active');
                    }
                }
            });
        });
        
        // Close menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768 && 
                !navContainer.contains(e.target) && 
                !menuToggle.contains(e.target) && 
                navContainer.classList.contains('active')) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
        
        // Update menu behavior on window resize
        window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
                    dropdown.classList.remove('active');
                });
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
    });
</script>

<h1>
  Get Gunged with Emerald Owl Productionswith
  Dripping In Confidence
</h1>
<p>
  Remember watching classic game showswhere
  participants were drenched in colorfulslime and
  thinking, "I wish I could experiencethat!"? Now,
  you can! Emerald Owl Productions introduces
  Dripping InConfidence which brings the
  exhilarating experience ofgetting gunged to
  life, offering a unique andmemorable addition to
  any event.
</p>
<h2>What is Gunge?</h2>
<p>
  Gunge, often referred to as slime, is
  aplayful,messy substance used in
  variousentertainment settings. Unlike
  traditionalhand-made slime,which can be sticky
  anddifficult to clean, the gunge used by Emerald
  OwlProductions is designed for maximum fun and
  easycleanup. It's biodegradable,
  environmentallyfriendly, and non-toxic, ensuring
  a safeexperience for all participants.
</p>
<h2>Gunge Events by Emerald Owl Productions</h2>
<p>
  Emerald Owl Productions offers customizable
  gungeexperiences suitable for fundraisers,
  schoolevents, corporate team-building, and
  privateparties. Participants, often referred to
  as"slime targets," can be volunteers or
  nominatedindividuals, such as teachers,
  principals,coaches, or team leaders. The
  anticipation andexcitement of seeing someone get
  gunged add aunique element of fun to anyevent.
</p>
<h2>Dripping In Confidence: Embrace the Mess</h2>
<p>
  Dripping In Confidence is an initiativethat
  encourages individuals to embrace the
  funandmessiness of getting gunged. It's a
  symbolicact promoting confidence and the joy of
  livingin the moment. Whether it's agraduation
  celebration, a family picnic, or acorporate
  milestone, Dripping In Confidenceprovides a
  platform for unforgettableexperiences.
</p>
<h2>Preparing for Your Gunge Experience</h2>
<p>
  To ensure a fun and comfortable gunge
  experience,consider the following tips:
</p>
<ul>
  <li>
    Wear clothes that you don't mind getting
    messy,similar to attire for a color run ormud
    run.
  </li>
  <li>
    Bring a full change of clothes and twotowels
    for cleanup.
  </li>
  <li>
    Challenge friends or colleagues to joinyou;
    it's more fun with a group!
  </li>
  <li>
    Avoid wearing ponchos or shower caps, asthe
    experience is more enjoyable whenfully
    embraced.
  </li>
</ul>
<p>
  Emerald Owl Productions provides conditionerto
  apply before and after the gunge session toaid
  in cleanup, as well as shower wands andhoses for
  rinsing off.
</p>
<h2>Book Your Gunge Event Today</h2>
<p>
  Ready to add a splash of fun to your nextevent?
  Contact Emerald Owl Productions to discusshow a
  gunge experience can be tailored to yourneeds.
  Whether it's for fundraising,team-building, or
  just for fun, getting gunged isan unforgettable
  experience that participants andspectators alike
  will cherish.
</p>
<p>
  For more information and to book
  yourevent,visit<a href="https://www.emeraldowlproductions.com/">Emerald Owl Productions</a>and<a href="https://www.drippinginconfidence.com/">Dripping In Confidence</a>.
</p>
